entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
